alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Oglala Lakota (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 11:25PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Oglala Lakota and western Bennett Counties through MIDNIGHT MDT... At 1125 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 3 miles west of Wakpamni, or 16 miles north of Gordon, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Wakpamni around 1130 PM MDT. Batesland around 1135 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
